welcome.Title: Welcome to SCS
welcome.Intro:
This module is an implementation of the Simultaneous Combat System described in this reddit post
Don\'t show this tutorial again.

howItWorks.Title: How it works
howItWorks.Intro: Instead of each character taking their own turn sequentially, everything happens all at once. In order to prevent total chaos, combat still happens in rounds and there is a structure to each round. That is, they are divided into phases: {scs.phases}.

combatTracker.Title: Where is the Combat Tracker?
combatTracker.Intro: Since combat happens simultaneously with this system, I've disabled the combat tracker. You can always renable it in the module's settings.

movingAround.Title: How do I move this thing around?
movingAround.Intro: You can drag the app around by clicking and holding this text. It snaps to the bottom left corner, but will remember it's position wherever you choose to put it.
